Reviews.Title: WRONG ITEM ON THE DESCRIPTION
Reviews.Author: luis
Reviews.Content: same thing happened to me... i bought it because on the decription said unlocked and the model ot-708...but when i opened the box the model was ot-708A AND THIS IS NOT COMPATIBLE IN OTHER COUNTRY---I RECIEVED THE WRONG ITEM...BAD XPERIENCE---

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Claudia
Reviews.Content: The phone device it's ok, but too little to the point that it will get lost so easy, I don't recommend it for messy people like me.

Reviews.Title: does not work
Reviews.Author: fabian76
Reviews.Content: When i bought this cellphone in the description says unlocked cause i needed for Costa Rica and it did not work
